verses.roman:
eka kṛṣṇa--sarva-sevya, jagat-īśvara
āra yata saba,--tāṅra sevakānucara

synonyms: eka kṛṣṇa—one Lord Kṛṣṇa; sarva-sevya—worthy of being served by all; jagat-īśvara—the Lord of the universe; āra yata saba—all others; tāṅra—His; sevaka-anucara—servants of the servants.
translation: Lord Kṛṣṇa, the one master and the Lord of the universe, is worthy of being served by everyone. Indeed, everyone is but a servant of His servants.
